ygData.subject: RE: Mid-level songs
ygData.msgSnippet: i tried it last night, cause i went to kill lord grimlot, a tough SK.  once the fight began, i tried to sing and and learned real fast that it is strings only,
ygData.messageBody:
i tried it last night, cause i went to kill lord grimlot, a tough SK. once
the fight began, i tried to sing and and learned real fast that it is
strings only, you can't sing it. and once the fight was over, the only
spell left on me was the Steal Strength spell, and the song did not remove
it. that's my only experience with the song so far though.

Shada D'ukal, L50 Wood Elf Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, L21 High Elf Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----

>
> From: "Ilkka Salmenkaita" <isalmen@...>
>
> > 22 -- Alenia's Disenchanting Melody. As far as I can tell, this
> > doesn't do squat. Never memorized.
>
> It removes any malicious spells on you or your group members.
> It actually is useful in an area with lots of necros or shamans.
> This is confirmed, 1st hand information and not off a website =)
> Especially if those shamans are casting drowsy-line spell one
> after one after one, if the song cancels those too =) (not sure)
> Also, have not tried, but I bet you 100:1 ratio that it will remove
> root.
>
> > fought anything with disease, it was the undead gnolls in Lake
> > Rathe (at the S Karana zone border), and we just had our druid
> > cure us after the fight. No biggie. I don't think anyone in
> > the party would have even cared for extra disease resistance.
>
> Wonder if some spesific song would have been a nice fast
> way to get rid of all those (only) annoying bad spells laid on
> you and your group ;)
>
> - Ilkka Salmenkaita, isalmen@...
>
>
>
